page.title: 01INTRODUCTION.
page.content:
This Domesday block consists mainly of agricultural land lying between the towns of Chepstow and Caldicot in the south-east corner of Gwent.
Two major roads run through the block providing easy communication with Bristol and London via the Severn Bridge, and with Newport and Cardiff to the west.
The village of Mathern lies on the eastern perimeter of this block, and it is from the pupils and parents of the village school that most of the information contained in this entry has been obtained.
